entry.title: Update
entry.content:
Hi!

So about "That's all for today, no guarantee I'll be making another post but I quite enjoy this so I probably will." in my previous post, yeah I lied so bad lol.

It was mostly because I'm lazy, but now...

I really have nothing interesting in my life anymore.

I know nobody's gonna read this but damn, I really am lonely. So lonely. Way too lonely.

I've done so many different things to distract myself, but nothing works. Everything is so boring. Not inherently, but rather because I wish he was here too.

I don't thing I'll ever move on either. I mean, I already have two people still on my mind since 2 years ago, now it's another tally.

I don't know how am I supposed to enjoy life anymore.

Oh well, I just hope I die in my sleep, if I don't then I'll just try my best to graduate college, after that I'm going to run away and live in a remote forest. I don't care about progressing in life anymore. Sorry dad and mom that your son is a chronic loner loser with no talent.

entry.title: 1st post
entry.content:
So today...

Nothing really interesting, it's saturday, after all. But as happy as I am currently, I sometimes miss the busyness of workdays during saturday and sunday. And then the vice versa happens when it's actually a workday, haha. Can't be helped, humans are never satisfied with what they have.

Since there's not much to say, I'll share some things that I have done and saw today. Me and my friends played L4D2 in the morning then at noon I tried to revive JadeSR, which didn't go too well because a certain shark vtuber fan stripped the protobufs. Then there's nothing interesting until...

DRAMA ALERT!!

Oh what's this, a screenshot from Doonle? A certain someone is getting angry at him? Angry because of their own fault? Playing victim too?! No way I am getting left out!

Then I, naturally, showed it to another friend, who was also a victim of this someone... We all laughed together! How can someone like this exist?! To betray people's trust so easily, to steal their works, and ultimately, getting angry at them too?! What the sigma?!

Well, enough drama. Another thing I did today is cleaning up my SSD! I went from having 90GB left to 230GB left, how cool is that? Though, I had to sacrifice many programming languages, my ISOs, softwares, and my project files... Oh and most importantly, deleted Genshin Impact. I forgot I still had that sad excuse of a video game installed.

I kept Rust and Deno, though. Not a surprise, since I use Rust alot. But Deno, I've never used it despite installing it some months ago. So I decided to try it out, and looked for something made with it and voila, here it is. md2blog, made by Jared Krinke, was used to make this page. Very cool, huh?

That's all for today, no guarantee I'll be making another post but I quite enjoy this so I probably will.
